sect1.title: Zym_Paginate_Iterator
sect1.programlisting: $data = new ArrayObject(range(1,100)); // Create an array containing the numbers 1 to 100. $paginate = new Zym_Paginate_Iterator($data->getIterator()); $paginate->setRowLimit(15); // I want to show 15 items per page. Setting this is optional, it will default to 10. $page3 = $paginate->getPage(3); // Get page 3
